definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: The measurement in heat of fusion of ice is one of experiments in thermodynamics done in many universities.
sentences.chinese: 冰的熔解热的测量是许多高校所开设的热学实验之一。

sentences.english: Prohibit using a direct fire or liquating paint under airtight condition.
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用明火加温或在密闭状态下熔解漆料。

sentences.english: Its hyperchromic effect of slowly increasing the temperature is characterestic for single-strand RNA.
sentences.chinese: 核酸温度熔解曲线的测定证明它是一个单链的RNA。

sentences.english: The candle softened and melted in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 蜡烛在太阳光下变软而熔解。

sentences.english: Until heaters can melt the ice, the pitot probes are out.
sentences.chinese: 如果有热源将冰融化，皮托管也随之熔解。

sentences.english: It is difficult to completely recycle Ag which dissolved in the chloride solution.
sentences.chinese: 想要从熔解氯化物中充分回收银时很难办到。

sentences.english: Aluminum can be remelted as successfully and as often as glass.
sentences.chinese: 铝和玻璃一样可被熔解。

sentences.english: China has never experienced a major nuclear meltdown.
sentences.chinese: 中国从未遭受过重大核熔解事故。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
